description: Returns metadata about a backup vault specified by its name.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Amazon Web Services Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: VaultState
nested_items.description: The current state of the vault.->

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The server-side encryption key that is used to protect your backups; for example, arn:aws:kms:us-west-2:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup vault is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CreatorRequestId
nested_items.description: A unique string that identifies the request and allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice. This parameter is optional. If used, this parameter must contain 1 to 50 alphanumeric or ---_.' characters.

nested_items.name: NumberOfRecoveryPoints
nested_items.description: The number of recovery points that are stored in a backup vault.

nested_items.name: Locked
nested_items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether Backup Vault Lock is currently protecting the backup vault. True means that Vault Lock causes delete or update operations on the recovery points stored in the vault to fail.

nested_items.name: MinRetentionDays
nested_items.description: The Backup Vault Lock setting that specifies the minimum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points. If this parameter is not specified, Vault Lock will not enforce a minimum retention period.

nested_items.name: MaxRetentionDays
nested_items.description: The Backup Vault Lock setting that specifies the maximum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points. If this parameter is not specified, Vault Lock does not enforce a maximum retention period on the recovery points in the vault (allowing indefinite storage).

nested_items.name: LockDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when Backup Vault Lock configuration cannot be changed or deleted.
